reviewText: Great episodes...poor guy has really had a tough time with health issues lately...hard to believe someone so strong could become ill like that...but he has a good attitude and is an inspiration to others no matter the challenges of life !...D
Tred Barta is great and really loved this DVD set.  Gave it my Uncle to watch while he was in the hospital.  Really inspiring the story of Barta and how he still gets out in the adventure.  Go Tred!

While I've never been hunting for some reason I saw this on tv one day and watched it and it ended up being one of my favorite shows. Barta proves it's not always about the kill. It's about doing things the hard way,the Barta way.
Bought this as a gift and our friend really loved it. Its a great gift for the fish lover and ships super quick
Bought this for my husband, don't watch these kind of videos.  He said it was good, he watches alot of hunting shows and videos.  It was as described and came in a timely fashion.
This DVD was hilarious.  My wife even enjoyed it.  If you enjoy wildlife, or just humor, this is a great DVD.

I bought this as a Christmas gift for a friend, they opened it and it was missing disc one! HOW EMBARRASSING right?!? And the questions begin with where did you buy this? I would recommend not buying DVD's from the company, I also have friends that have made purchases from them and they two were missing Disc one or two. Not worth the money, they also make you pay to return the item to get a refund. That's right you pay two times for their mistake! I would have rather paid full price and actually got what I should have in the first place. Don't make my mistake!!!
This was a present for my husband.  It came quickly, in great condition. My husband really enjoys Tred Barta.  I would recommend this video.

Good videos for entertainment purposes.  The hunts are realistic and Tred is a pretty entertaining character.  Other than the water safety they are not instructional or meant to be.  More just a view into the life of a bow hunter and fisherman.
worth it just for the grizzly hunt.  does it his way and even leaves in the mistakes, so you can learn from them too.
